thread.title: Walmart is known for its ethical conduct, says retail analyst Mary Epner

title: Walmart is known for its ethical conduct, says retail analyst Mary Epner

organizations.name: ceo of mary epner retail analysis

text:
Walmart is known for its ethical conduct, says retail analyst Mary Epner 11:09pm IST - 03:25 
Walmart will not settle cases and take this to the end, says Mary Epner, CEO of Mary Epner Retail Analysis, about former Walmart executive Tri Huynh's allegations that the company cheated on e-commerce. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
Walmart will not settle cases and take this to the end, says Mary Epner, CEO of Mary Epner Retail Analysis, about former Walmart executive Tri Huynh's allegations that the company cheated on e-commerce. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2pmLvt0
